thread.title: When will the Oregon Ducks' uniform madness stop? Snap Judgments & Cheap Shots
thread.title_full: When will the Oregon Ducks' uniform madness stop? Snap Judgments & Cheap Shots | OregonLive.com

author: Ken Goe | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: When will the Oregon Ducks' uniform madness stop? Snap Judgments & Cheap Shots
text:
An irreverent look at college football ...
1. Did the fashionistas at Oregon really steal Lewis & Clark College's name and nickname for their latest uniform combination?
2. Yeah, but they should have stolen a quarterback.
3. Wait, I thought they did.
4. Apparently, this uniform ensemble honors Meriwether Lewis and William Clark.
5. What's next? Uniforms honoring the Beaver State?
6. Anything to deflect attention from the secondary.
Meriwether Lewis AP Photo/File 7. Maybe Oregon should just build fancier football facilities because WSU coach Mike Leach says his are better.
8. Well, the wacky weed is legal in Pullman.
9. Leach's facilities are better than Portland State's, for what that's worth.
10. Apparently, not much.
Editor's note: Goe went to Lewis & Clark, an admission mistake from which the school never really has recovered.
-- Ken Goe
kgoe@oregonian.com
503-221-8040 | @KenGoe
